summary: Adding a lot of New Weapons on Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center]######################################################################
<br />####################### More Weapon Pack by xFinal #######################
<br />######################################################################[/center]
<br />
<br />xFinal's new Weapon Pack include:
<br />
<br />- - - > 13 New Bow's
<br />- - - > 17 New Sword's
<br />- - - > 11 New Greatsword's
<br />- - - > 13 New Waraxe's
<br />- - - > 11 New Battleaxe's
<br />- - - > 08 New Warhammer's
<br />- - - > 10 New Dagger's
<br />- - - > 08 New Mace's
<br />
<br />[center]How to forge the Weapon's:
<br />
<br />Daedric Sword of Strength = 2x Daedric Sword and 8000 Gold on Skyforge.
<br />Orcish Sword of Strength = 2x Orcish Sword and 3000 Gold an Normal Forge.[/center]
<br />
<br />[center]How to Sharpen the Weapon's:
<br />
<br />Daedric Sword of Strength = 5 Daedra Heart and 2000 Gold on Grindstone.
<br />Orcish Sword of Strength = 15 Orichalcum and 750 Gold on Grindstone.[/center]
<br />
<br />Note:
<br />
<br />- - - > Add to all Weapon's Damage x 0.5
<br />- - - > Add to all Weapon's Crit x 0.5
<br />- - - > Add to all Weapon's Speed x 2
<br />
<br />
<br />Info to all:
<br />
<br />- - - > This is my first Mod for Skyrim: The Elder Scolls.
<br />- - - > You can add me on Steam, if you have any Suggestions or Improvements.
<br />- - - > Please Share this Mod Pack with you'r Friend's and Rate it.
<br />- - - > Thank's for Subscribe my Mod and have fun with my Mod Pack.
<br />
<br />[center]######################################################################
<br />####################### All New Weapon's by xFinal ########################
<br />######################################################################[/center]
